Description: All resistances <r>-1% per charge</r>. Upon reaching <w>25 charges</w>, it explodes: Remove all charges, then apply <r>1 Bleed per charge</r> and heal all allies for <g>1 HP per charge</g>.
DescriptionExtended:
All resistances -1% per charge.
Upon reaching 25 charges, it explodes: Remove all charges, then apply 1 Bleed per charge and heal all allies for 1 HP per charge.
Remove 1 charge at the end of the turn.
